name: Flippy Card Throwing Tricks for Perfect Dudes
name_original: Flippy Card Throwing Tricks for Perfect Dudes
description:
You have seen it on video ,Now its your turn to try it yourself.
Learn Card Throwing Tricks as the Dude in this Real Time thriller !
Just Swipe when the Two lines meet but Be Careful , Don't Throw Cards at the PERFECT DUDE !
